strings: <Cap><leader> discovers a new recipe for the alchemy pot!
<Cap><string_1> <equal> <Cap><string_2> + <Cap><string_3>
<Cap><string_1> <equal> <Cap><string_2> + <Cap><string_3> + <Cap><string_4>
<se_low>Gemon: <IF_SOLO>A human<ELSE_NOT_SOLO>Humans<ENDIF_SOLO>!? What <IF_SOLO>is a human<ELSE_NOT_SOLO>are humans<ENDIF_SOLO> doing in MY domain!?
<se_low>Gemon: And that colour! You are not of the Dark realm! It seems you have strayed into a place you are not welcome.
<se_low>Gemon: But at a good time! I was getting bored of watching this egg.
<se_low>Gemon: I'm sure the Lord of Darkness would permit me to enjoy a little distraction!
<se_low>Gemon: You fool<IF_SOLO><ELSE_NOT_SOLO>s<ENDIF_SOLO>! Do you crave punishment!?
<se_low>Gemon: Still, it is tedious watching this egg all the time. Let's have some fun!

<voice_0x01001419><center>When you wish to return to the hill,
<center>call for me and I will take you back.
<voice_0x01001410><center>Are you ready to go now?

<voice_0x01001422><center>If my old powers were to return,
<center>I'm sure I could help you.
<center>I'm sorry that I cannot be of any use.

<voice_0x01001421><center>No? You don't want me to take you there?
<center>I'm afraid that's all I can do
<center>for you at present...

<voice_0x0100141A><center>Farewell for now.
<center>Please save my egg.
<center>You are my only hope.
<voice_0x01001416><center>Then let us depart.
<center>Please. Take the soulstone of my son.
<center>Would you like to return to the grassy hill?

<center>I see. Well I shall be waiting for you here
<center>should you change your mind.
<center>Very well. Then I shall take you.

<center>The soulstone will allow you humans to change
<center>your physical form into that of a bird and fly.

<center>But its powers are limited to use in our world;
<center>the World of Light.

<center>We should be leaving soon.
<center>Climb upon my back and I shall carry you.
